name: C# Markup 2 for Uno Platform
description: Project that adds concise C# Markup 2 to a Uno Platform 5 Solution

AppProjectName.description:
The folder name of the existing Uno app project (the project that contains App.cs).
Also used for the app project file name and the app assembly file name.

AppRootNamespace.description:
The root namespace (without trailing .) of your Uno application project (the project that contains App.cs).
Used as prefix for the Markup project root namespace.

DotNetVersion.description: Which .NET version to use in target platforms

choices.description: Target all Uno supported platforms on .NET 7.0
Target all Uno supported platforms on .NET 8.0

postActions.description: Add the Markup project to the solution

manualInstructions.text: Add generated project to solution manually

postActions.description: Add NuGet package references to the Markup project, and add a Markup project reference to the Uno application project

manualInstructions.text: Manually execute the commands in AddPackageAndProjectReferences.ps1
